name: N0pe.github.io
body:
### n0pe

Welcome to my GitHub page!


### Tracert

[Tracert - A traceroute tool](https://github.com/n0pe/Tracert)

Tracert is a simple traceroute tool written in python. Support several type of protocol (ICMP/UDP/TCP, default is ICMP) and functions.

**Dependences**: _python-scapy_.

**Usage**: _tracert.py [options]

**Options**

-h, --help Show this help message.

-t TARGET, --target=TARGET Target address.

-p PROTO, --proto=PROTO Protocol (ICMP/UDP/TCP).

-f FIND, --find=FIND Find specific ip address.

-n NODE, --node=NODE Number of nodes/hops.

**Examples**

_./tracert.py -t 12.13.14.15_
_./tracert.py -t 12.13.14.15 -p tcp -n 5 -f 16.17.18.19_
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
